types.name: ApiVersion
types.description:
A version of the API, as defined by [Shopify API versioning](https://shopify.dev/api/usage/versioning).
Versions are commonly referred to by their handle (for example, `2021-10`).

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: The human-readable name of the version.

fields.name: handle
fields.description: The unique identifier of an ApiVersion. All supported API versions have a date-based (YYYY-MM) or `unstable` handle.

fields.name: supported
fields.description: Whether the version is actively supported by Shopify. Supported API versions are guaranteed to be stable. Unsupported API versions include unstable, release candidate, and end-of-life versions that are marked as unsupported. For more information, refer to [Versioning](https://shopify.dev/api/usage/versioning).

types.name: AppliedGiftCard
types.description: Details about the gift card used on the checkout.

fields.name: amountUsed
fields.description: The amount that was taken from the gift card by applying it.

fields.name: amountUsedV2
fields.description: The amount that was taken from the gift card by applying it.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: The amount left on the gift card.

fields.name: balanceV2
fields.description: The amount left on the gift card.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: lastCharacters
fields.description: The last characters of the gift card.

fields.name: presentmentAmountUsed
fields.description: The amount that was applied to the checkout in its currency.

types.name: Article
types.description: An article in an online store blog.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The article's author.

fields.name: authorV2

fields.name: blog
fields.description: The blog that the article belongs to.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: List of comments posted on the article.

fields.description: The URL used for viewing the resource on the shop's Online Store. Returns `null` if the resource is currently not published to the Online Store sales channel.

fields.name: publishedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the article was published.

fields.name: seo

fields.name: tags

fields.name: title
fields.description: The article’s name.

types.name: AutomaticDiscountApplication
types.description: Automatic discount applications capture the intentions of a discount that was automatically applied.

fields.name: allocationMethod
fields.description: The method by which the discount's value is allocated to its entitled items.

fields.name: targetSelection
fields.description: Which lines of targetType that the discount is allocated over.

fields.name: targetType
fields.description: The type of line that the discount is applicable towards.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the application.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the discount application.

types.name: AvailableShippingRates
types.description: A collection of available shipping rates for a checkout.

fields.name: ready
fields.description:
Whether or not the shipping rates are ready.
The `shippingRates` field is `null` when this value is `false`.
This field should be polled until its value becomes `true`.

fields.name: shippingRates
fields.description: The fetched shipping rates. `null` until the `ready` field is `true`.

for more information about using filters.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: CardBrand
types.description: Card brand, such as Visa or Mastercard, which can be used for payments.

types.name: Cart
types.description: A cart represents the merchandise that a buyer intends to purchase, and the estimated cost associated with the cart. To learn how to interact with a cart during a customer's session, refer to [Manage a cart with the Storefront API](https://shopify.dev/api/examples/cart).

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: The attributes associated with the cart. Attributes are represented as key-value pairs.

fields.name: buyerIdentity
fields.description: Information about the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

fields.name: checkoutUrl
fields.description: The URL of the checkout for the cart.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the cart was created.

fields.name: deliveryGroups
fields.description: The delivery groups available for the cart, based on the default address of the logged-in customer.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: discountCodes
fields.description: The case-insensitive discount codes that the customer added at checkout.

fields.name: estimatedCost
fields.description: The estimated costs that the buyer will pay at checkout. The estimated costs are subject to change and changes will be reflected at checkout. The `estimatedCost` field uses the `buyerIdentity` field to determine [international pricing](https://shopify.dev/api/examples/international-pricing#create-a-cart).

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: lines
fields.description: A list of lines containing information about the items the customer intends to purchase.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: note
fields.description: A note that is associated with the cart. For example, the note can be a personalized message to the buyer.

fields.name: totalQuantity
fields.description: The total number of items in the cart.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the cart was updated.

types.description: The discounts automatically applied to the cart line based on prerequisites that have been met.

fields.name: discountedAmount
fields.description: The discounted amount that has been applied to the cart line.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the allocated discount.

types.name: CartBuyerIdentity
types.description: Represents information about the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

fields.name: countryCode
fields.description: The country where the buyer is located.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: The customer account associated with the cart.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

types.name: CartBuyerIdentityInput
types.description:
Specifies the input fields to update the buyer information associated with a cart.
Buyer identity is used to determine
[international pricing](https://shopify.dev/api/examples/international-pricing#create-a-checkout)
and should match the customer's shipping address.

inputFields.name: countryCode
inputFields.description: The country where the buyer is located.

inputFields.name: customerAccessToken
inputFields.description: The access token used to identify the customer associated with the cart.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The email address of the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

inputFields.name: phone
inputFields.description: The phone number of the buyer that is interacting with the cart.

types.description: Return type for `cartBuyerIdentityUpdate` mutation.

fields.name: cart
fields.description: The updated cart.

fields.name: userErrors
fields.description: The list of errors that occurred from executing the mutation.

types.description: The discount that has been applied to the cart line using a discount code.

fields.name: code
fields.description: The code used to apply the discount.

fields.description: The discounted amount that has been applied to the cart line.

types.name: CartErrorCode
types.description: Possible error codes that can be returned by `CartUserError`.

enumValues.name: INVALID_MERCHANDISE_LINE
enumValues.description: Merchandise line was not found in cart.

enumValues.name: LESS_THAN
enumValues.description: The input value should be less than the maximum value allowed.

types.name: CartEstimatedCost
types.description:
The estimated costs that the buyer will pay at checkout.
It uses [`CartBuyerIdentity`](https://shopify.dev/api/storefront/reference/cart/cartbuyeridentity) to determine
[international pricing](https://shopify.dev/api/examples/international-pricing#create-a-cart).

fields.name: subtotalAmount
fields.description: The estimated amount, before taxes and discounts, for the customer to pay.

fields.name: totalAmount
fields.description: The estimated total amount for the customer to pay.

fields.name: totalDutyAmount
fields.description: The estimated duty amount for the customer to pay at checkout.

fields.name: totalTaxAmount
fields.description: The estimated tax amount for the customer to pay at checkout.

types.name: CartInput
types.description: Specifies the input fields to create a cart.

inputFields.name: attributes
inputFields.description: An array of key-value pairs that contains additional information about the cart.

inputFields.name: buyerIdentity
inputFields.description: The customer associated with the cart. Used to determine [international pricing](https://shopify.dev/api/examples/international-pricing#create-a-checkout). Buyer identity should match the customer's shipping address.

inputFields.name: discountCodes
inputFields.description: The case-insensitive discount codes that the customer added at checkout.

inputFields.name: lines
inputFields.description: A list of merchandise lines to add to the cart.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: A note that is associated with the cart. For example, the note can be a personalized message to the buyer.

types.name: CartLine
types.description: Represents information about the merchandise in the cart.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: The attributes associated with the cart line. Attributes are represented as key-value pairs.

fields.name: discountAllocations
fields.description: The discounts that have been applied to the cart line.

fields.name: estimatedCost
fields.description: The estimated cost of the merchandise that the buyer will pay for at checkout. The estimated costs are subject to change and changes will be reflected at checkout.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: merchandise
fields.description: The merchandise that the buyer intends to purchase.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The quantity of the merchandise that the customer intends to purchase.

fields.name: sellingPlanAllocation
fields.description: The selling plan associated with the cart line and the effect that each selling plan has on variants when they're purchased.

types.name: CartLineEstimatedCost
types.description: The estimated cost of the merchandise line that the buyer will pay at checkout.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the merchandise line.

fields.name: compareAtAmount
fields.description: The compare at amount of the merchandise line.

fields.name: subtotalAmount
fields.description: The estimated cost of the merchandise line before discounts.

fields.name: totalAmount
fields.description: The estimated total cost of the merchandise line.

types.name: CartLineInput
types.description: Specifies the input fields to create a merchandise line on a cart.

inputFields.name: attributes
inputFields.description: An array of key-value pairs that contains additional information about the merchandise line.

inputFields.description: The identifier of the merchandise that the buyer intends to purchase.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the merchandise.

inputFields.name: sellingPlanId
inputFields.description: The identifier of the selling plan that the merchandise is being purchased with.

inputFields.name: quantity

types.name: Checkout
types.description: A container for all the information required to checkout items and pay.

fields.name: appliedGiftCards
fields.description: The gift cards used on the checkout.

fields.name: availableShippingRates
fields.description:
The available shipping rates for this Checkout.
Should only be used when checkout `requiresShipping` is `true` and
the shipping address is valid.

fields.name: buyerIdentity
fields.description: The identity of the customer associated with the checkout.

fields.name: completedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was completed.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was created.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.description: The currency code for the checkout.

fields.name: customAttributes
fields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

fields.name: discountApplications
fields.description: Discounts that have been applied on the checkout.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email attached to this checkout.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: lineItems
fields.description: A list of line item objects, each one containing information about an item in the checkout.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: lineItemsSubtotalPrice
fields.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the checkout. Duties, taxes, shipping and discounts excluded.

fields.name: note
fields.description: The note associated with the checkout.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The resulting order from a paid checkout.

fields.name: orderStatusUrl
fields.description: The Order Status Page for this Checkout, null when checkout is not completed.

fields.name: paymentDue
fields.description: The amount left to be paid. This is equal to the cost of the line items, taxes and shipping minus discounts and gift cards.

fields.name: paymentDueV2
fields.description: The amount left to be paid. This is equal to the cost of the line items, duties, taxes and shipping minus discounts and gift cards.

fields.name: ready
fields.description:
Whether or not the Checkout is ready and can be completed. Checkouts may
have asynchronous operations that can take time to finish. If you want
to complete a checkout or ensure all the fields are populated and up to
date, polling is required until the value is true.

fields.name: requiresShipping
fields.description: States whether or not the fulfillment requires shipping.

fields.name: shippingAddress
fields.description: The shipping address to where the line items will be shipped.

fields.name: shippingDiscountAllocations
fields.description: The discounts that have been allocated onto the shipping line by discount applications.

fields.name: shippingLine
fields.description: Once a shipping rate is selected by the customer it is transitioned to a `shipping_line` object.

fields.name: subtotalPrice
fields.description: Price of the checkout before shipping and taxes.

fields.name: subtotalPriceV2
fields.description: Price of the checkout before duties, shipping and taxes.

fields.name: taxExempt
fields.description: Whether the checkout is tax exempt.

fields.name: taxesIncluded
fields.description: Whether taxes are included in the line item and shipping line prices.

fields.name: totalDuties
fields.description: The sum of all the duties applied to the line items in the checkout.

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the checkout, taxes and discounts included.

fields.name: totalPriceV2
fields.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the checkout, duties, taxes and discounts included.

fields.name: totalTax
fields.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the line items and shipping lines in the checkout.

fields.name: totalTaxV2
fields.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the line items and shipping lines in the checkout.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was last updated.

fields.name: webUrl
fields.description: The url pointing to the checkout accessible from the web.

types.name: CheckoutAttributesUpdateInput
types.description: Specifies the fields required to update a checkout's attributes.

inputFields.name: allowPartialAddresses
inputFields.description:
Allows setting partial addresses on a Checkout, skipping the full validation of attributes.
The required attributes are city, province, and country.
Full validation of the addresses is still done at completion time. Defaults to `false` with
each operation.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the checkout.

types.description: Return type for `checkoutAttributesUpdate` mutation.

For example, `CA`. Including this field creates a checkout in the specified country's currency.

types.name: CheckoutCreateInput
types.description: Specifies the fields required to create a checkout.

inputFields.name: allowPartialAddresses
inputFields.description:
Allows setting partial addresses on a Checkout, skipping the full validation of attributes.
The required attributes are city, province, and country.
Full validation of addresses is still done at completion time. Defaults to `null`.

inputFields.name: buyerIdentity
inputFields.description: The identity of the customer associated with the checkout.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The email with which the customer wants to checkout.

inputFields.name: lineItems
inputFields.description: A list of line item objects, each one containing information about an item in the checkout.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the checkout.

inputFields.name: presentmentCurrencyCode
inputFields.description:
The three-letter currency code of one of the shop's enabled presentment currencies.
Including this field creates a checkout in the specified currency. By default, new
checkouts are created in the shop's primary currency.
 This argument is deprecated: Use `country` field instead.

inputFields.name: shippingAddress
inputFields.description: The shipping address to where the line items will be shipped.

fields.name: queueToken
fields.description: The checkout queue token. Available only to selected stores.

fields.name: userErrors
fields.description: The list of errors that occurred from executing the mutation.

types.name: CheckoutErrorCode
types.description: Possible error codes that can be returned by `CheckoutUserError`.

enumValues.name: BAD_DOMAIN
enumValues.description: Input email contains an invalid domain name.

enumValues.name: CART_DOES_NOT_MEET_DISCOUNT_REQUIREMENTS_NOTICE
enumValues.description: Cart does not meet discount requirements notice.

enumValues.name: CUSTOMER_ALREADY_USED_ONCE_PER_CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT_NOTICE
enumValues.description: Customer already used once per customer discount notice.

enumValues.name: GIFT_CARD_ALREADY_APPLIED
enumValues.description: Gift card has already been applied.

enumValues.name: GIFT_CARD_CURRENCY_MISMATCH
enumValues.description: Gift card currency does not match checkout currency.

enumValues.name: GIFT_CARD_DEPLETED
enumValues.description: Gift card has no funds left.

enumValues.name: GIFT_CARD_UNUSABLE
enumValues.description: Gift card cannot be applied to a checkout that contains a gift card.

enumValues.name: GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
enumValues.description: The input value should be greater than or equal to the minimum value allowed.

enumValues.name: INVALID_COUNTRY_AND_CURRENCY
enumValues.description: Cannot specify country and presentment currency code.

enumValues.name: INVALID_FOR_COUNTRY
enumValues.description: Input Zip is invalid for country provided.

enumValues.name: INVALID_FOR_COUNTRY_AND_PROVINCE
enumValues.description: Input Zip is invalid for country and province provided.

enumValues.name: LESS_THAN
enumValues.description: The input value should be less than the maximum value allowed.

enumValues.name: LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
enumValues.description: The input value should be less than or equal to the maximum value allowed.

enumValues.name: LINE_ITEM_NOT_FOUND
enumValues.description: Line item was not found in checkout.

enumValues.name: PRESENT
enumValues.description: The input value needs to be blank.

enumValues.name: TOO_LONG
enumValues.description: The input value is too long.

enumValues.name: TOTAL_PRICE_MISMATCH
enumValues.description: The amount of the payment does not match the value to be paid.

types.name: CheckoutLineItem
types.description: A single line item in the checkout, grouped by variant and attributes.

fields.name: customAttributes
fields.description: Extra information in the form of an array of Key-Value pairs about the line item.

fields.name: discountAllocations
fields.description: The discounts that have been allocated onto the checkout line item by discount applications.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The quantity of the line item.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the line item. Defaults to the product's title.

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.description: Unit price of the line item.

fields.name: variant
fields.description: Product variant of the line item.

types.name: CheckoutLineItemConnection
types.description: An auto-generated type for paginating through multiple CheckoutLineItems.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: A list of the nodes contained in CheckoutLineItemEdge.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

types.name: CheckoutLineItemEdge
types.description: An auto-generated type which holds one CheckoutLineItem and a cursor during pagination.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of CheckoutLineItemEdge.

types.name: CheckoutLineItemInput
types.description: Specifies the input fields to create a line item on a checkout.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Extra information in the form of an array of Key-Value pairs about the line item.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the line item.

inputFields.name: variantId
inputFields.description: The identifier of the product variant for the line item.

types.description: Specifies the input fields to update a line item on the checkout.

inputFields.name: quantity

inputFields.name: variantId
inputFields.description: The variant identifier of the line item.

types.name: CheckoutUserError
types.description: Represents an error that happens during execution of a checkout mutation.

fields.name: code

fields.name: field
fields.description: The path to the input field that caused the error.

fields.name: message

types.name: Collection
types.description: A collection represents a grouping of products that a shop owner can create to organize them or make their shops easier to browse.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Stripped description of the collection, single line with HTML tags removed.

args.name: truncateAt
args.description: Truncates string after the given length.

fields.name: descriptionHtml
fields.description: The description of the collection, complete with HTML formatting.

fields.name: handle
fields.description:
A human-friendly unique string for the collection automatically generated from its title.
Limit of 255 characters.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally-unique identifier.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Image associated with the collection.

fields.name: metafield
fields.description: Returns a metafield found by namespace and key.

args.name: key
args.description: Identifier for the metafield (maximum of 30 characters).

args.name: namespace
args.description: Container for a set of metafields (maximum of 20 characters).

fields.name: metafields
fields.description: A paginated list of metafields associated with the resource.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: namespace
args.description: Container for a set of metafields (maximum of 20 characters).

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.deprecationReason: The `metafields` field will be removed in the future in favor of using [aliases](https://graphql.org/learn/queries/#aliases) with the `metafield` field.

fields.name: onlineStoreUrl
